overview:
David Caldwell is an engineer with a diverse experience in technology projects and logistics.

A mechanical engineer by degree, David has practiced in engineering and transport business consultancy in Sydney, Australia and London, UK. David moved to express his innovative bent in 2006 with the Sydney-based startup AssistanceFast.com. David moved to London, continuing in project engineering. Here he co-founded YourJobDone.com which is undergoing beta trials as of July 2010.

David’s capacity for analysis, modelling and communication, was recognised by national awards, from the Institution of Engineers Australia for his Honours Thesis (2005 Annual RTSA Thesis Competition) and the Institution of Railway Signal Engineers (2007 Byles and Calcut award for best paper by engineer under 35). He is also published in the reviewed Transit Australia (2003 and 2008) on the subject of urban transportation revenue collection.

David Has been centrally occupied by London-based job coordinating startup YourJobDone.com since early 2009, but continues occasional consulting work in transport modelling and technology.
